001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005
006import java.util.function.Consumer;
007
008public interface IterativeOptimizer<N extends Number> {
009
010    @FunctionalInterface
011    interface EpochCompletionListener<N extends Number> {
012
013        void epochCompleted(int epoch, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression, DataSet<N> trainSet, IterativeOptimizer<N> optimizer);
014
015    }
016
017    static <N extends Number> EpochCompletionListener<N> initializer(Consumer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>> initializer) {
018        return (epoch, regression, trainSet, optimizer) -> {
019            if (epoch == 1) {
020                initializer.accept(regression);
021            }
022        };
023    }
024
025    static <N extends Number> EpochCompletionListener<N> initializer(Consumer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>> initializer, EpochCompletionListener<N> listener) {
026        return (epoch, regression, trainSet, optimizer) -> {
027            if (epoch == 1) {
028                initializer.accept(regression);
029            }
030            listener.epochCompleted(epoch, regression, trainSet, optimizer);
031        };
032    }
033
034    static <N extends Number> EpochCompletionListener<N> sample(int n, EpochCompletionListener<N> listener) {
035        return (epoch, regression, trainSet, optimizer) -> {
036            boolean call;
037            int totalEpochs = optimizer.getEpochs();
038            if (totalEpochs < n || totalEpochs == epoch || epoch == 1) {
039                call = true;
040            } else {
041                call = (epoch % (totalEpochs / n)) == 0;
042            }
043            if (call) {
044                listener.epochCompleted(epoch, regression, trainSet, optimizer);
045            }
046        };
047    }
048
049    int getEpochs();
050
051    void setEpochs(int epochs);
052
053    float getLearningRate();
054
055    void setLearningRate(float learningRate);
056
057    EpochCompletionListener<N> getEpochCompletionListener();
058
059    void setEpochCompletionListener(EpochCompletionListener<N> epochCompletionListener);
060
061}
